item.title: Monthly review - April 2017
item.description: Most interesting readings Neuralink and the Brain’s Magical Future futurism Multi-millionaire at 27, I spent all of my millions - two articles with valuable lessons on money, achievement, freedom and happiness. philosophy Build a Better Monster: Morality, Machine Learning, and Mass Surveillance - Maciej Cegłowski on dangerous path of technology crossing with advertisement industry, surveillance, power and if there is any hope? privacy technology List of personal data about you that anyone can buy privacy
